topic.title: Send a local XML inventory file to an inventory server

body.p:
You can push a locally generated inventory file to a FusionInventory for GLPI server by using the fusioninventory-injector command: fusioninventory-injector is available only since the 2.1.7 release of the agent.
fusioninventory-injector -v -f /tmp/toto-2010-09-10-11-42-22.ocs --url https://glpi/plugins/fusioninventory/

If you want to use a HTTP proxy, you can declare it with the http_proxy environment variable:
export http_proxy=http://www-proxy:3128
Please note that this script works with both FusionInventory for GLPI and OCS Inventory NG Server.
